article.headline: High Point 70, Radford 68
article.story: RADFORD, Va. (AP) -- Mike Jefferson hit a 3-pointer with 15 seconds left to give High Point a 70-68 victory over Radford on Monday night. Radford led by as much as 13 points in the first half and was ahead 35-30 at the break. High Point battled back in the second half and took its largest lead with 5:19 left when Cruz Daniels hit a pair of free throws to make it 57-55. Kenny Thomas made a 3-pointer with 30 seconds left to put Radford ahead 68-66. After a High Point timeout, Jefferson made the game-winning 3-pointer and sealed the Panthers' victory with a free throw with one second left. Jefferson finished with 14 points and four rebounds. Arizona Reid led High Point (11-9, 3-3 Big South) with 22 points and seven rebounds. Eugene Harris added 13 points. Thomas finished with 22 points and four rebounds to lead Radford (5-15, 0-5). Martell McDuffy added 18 points and Joey Lynch-Flohr had 11.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
